allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(security\): Address critical security vulnerabilities

Backend fixes:
- Remove insecure default values for SECRET_KEY, JWT_SECRET, DATABASE_URL
- Add Pydantic validators to enforce secure secret configuration
- Replace in-memory OAuth state with TTL-based storage \(prevents memory leak/DoS\)
- Add max capacity limit for OAuth states \(prevents memory exhaustion\)
- Sanitize error messages to prevent information disclosure
- Add input validation \(min/max length\) on OAuth code and state parameters
- Restrict CORS methods and headers \(was allowing all with credentials\)
- Update .env.example with secure defaults and warnings

Frontend fixes:
- Replace realistic Stripe API key pattern in mock data with obviously fake one
- Add form validation for profile settings \(name, email\)
- Add URL and secret validation for webhook configuration
- Display validation errors with proper UI feedback

EOF
\)")
